name: Ed The Elf's Bauble Blow Out
name_original: Ed The Elf's Bauble Blow Out
description:
Themes

Pigs In Blankets - The currency that was meant to be used in the game

Sleep - We got none. But in the game, you can have some, implemented at the last second. You run out of energy as you play, you have to go back and sleep if it gets too low.

Baubles - The enemies are mutant baubles. They're the coolest bit.
